notes: Initial release
Added version tracking (idea stolen from Fini the bot and his creator Taylor)
Added restart functionality
Updated to Claude 3.5 Sonnet
Increased token size to 8,192
I'll now refer to myself as Jaxon
Hopefully now refers to himself as Jaxon instead of Claude. Thanks Taylor.
Fixed the wordrank command not working. It now also displays usernames correctly

Changed the way wordrank and wordcount count words. They both now use an SQL query instead of a Python-based counting method. It's also kind of broken and won't count words with a comma attached right now
Removed the eu4_map command
Added minecraft_start and minecraft_restart to start and restart the minecraft server. Only my creator can use these currently.
Can now read attachment files that are in text
Added more parameters to be more of an eshay
Fixed being synced twice
Does a better job at writing messages longer than discords limits
i'm a dumb cunt
My temperature is now set a bit higher.
Fixed wordrank and wordcount not correctly counting words
Added a super secret feature
That boomer discord bot named Fini is talking shit, fight him
Code has been thoroghly cleaned up
'oi drongo' is no longer taken into consideration for the response message
Adjusted response guidelines
Fixed insulting. Maybe.
Code has been thoroghly cleaned up
'oi drongo' is no longer taken into consideration for the response message
Adjusted response guidelines even more
Fixed insulting. Maybe.
Added a command to download all server emojis. I dunno why.
Changed insult percentage chance from 1% to 0.2%, but Jaxon will also sometimes compliment you instead. It's 50/50 really
General bug fixes and improvements
Jaxon can now see images
Updated to latest AI model
Jaxon now has modes that change his compliment/insult ratios and % chances.
Removed a bunch of useless commands
Command updates
Code refactoring
Added achievement system with 8 unique achievements to discover
Added /achievements command to check your progress
Added a /webstats command to give a link to a local-hosted webpage showing some stats from the message database
No longer insults attachments based on URL, but instead on the image itself
Revamped Achievement look, now uses embed and other kind of info
Also revamped the achievement leaderboard
Achievement descriptions have been removed, so that if one person gets an achievement, it's not as obvious as to how they got it to other users
New achievements have been added
New achievements have been added
All achievements now have a first discoverer bonus, meaning the user who gets it first will gain more points
Achievements now have patterns, and may change criteria slightly to decrease the odds of other users figuring out how it was obtained
/achievements has been revamped to provide hints
Once an achievement has been earned, the person who earned it can see a description of how they got it using /achievements. Only the user can see this
Achievements have been reset
Removed achievement system
Updated prompts for responses
Updated model to Sonnet 3.7. Including {extended_think} in a message will activate extended thinking for that message
